job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: ltpgtour mission is to bring the power of ai to healthcare to improve patient treatment drug development and healthcare systems for better healthcare outcomes we believe that the future of healthcare and the future of ai and machine learning are deeply interconnected with healthcare delivery evolving towards precision medicine an individuals care and treatment will be uniquely tailored to that patients history and situationltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtour team is looking for machine learning engineers to take our aidriven healthcare platform to the next level you will work in a highly collaborative global environment of data scientists machine learning engineers domain experts and business leaders focused on delivering aidriven healthcare solutions that have the potential to fundamentally alter how healthcare is thought about and delivered globallyltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltugtresponsibilitiesltugtltpgtltulgtltligthandson machine learning development designing building testing deploying and optimizing aidriven healthcare solutions in collaboration with product managers data scientists and data engineersltligtltligtdevelop new features and tools for data scientists and machine learning engineers and continuously improve existing ones based on feedback from the teamltligtltligtautomate model training and testing and deployment via machine learning continuous delivery pipelinesltligtltligtdesign and implement metrics to verify model and algorithm effectivenessltligtltligtdevelop solution architecture for aidriven applications including production deployment of machine learning modelsltligtltligtdevelop and integrate security technologies and controls to ensure the security and privacy of healthcare data provided by our partnersltligtltligtbring an entrepreneurial mindset openness transparency and collegiality to your everyday workltligtltulgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltugtminimum qualificationsltugtltpgtltulgtltligtms in computer science is requiredltligtltligtgood understanding of machine learning fundamentals including classical machine learning and deep learning techniquesltligtltligtexperience implementing production machine learning systems in java scala python or similar languagesltligtltligtdevops mindset and experience with continuous integration and automation tools and processes like jenkinsltligtltligta strong desire to build meaningful solutions for a life sciences businessltligtltligttask oriented with an ability to set goals and complete deliverablesltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtwe are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company we do not discriminate on the basis of race religion color national origin gender sexual orientation age marital status veteran status or disability statusltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltugtcompany informationltugtltpgtltpgtwe are a new startup currently in stealth mode however please reach out to us with a cv and a note on why you are interested and we will be happy to share more information with you we are backed by one of the most innovative biopharma companies to launch in the past decade with a unique business model one that is revolutionizing the way drugs are developed and brought to marketltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtwe are located in the kendall squaremit area of cambridge one of the major hubs of global innovation in healthcare technologiesltpgt
